channel.title: Can someone show me how to do this please? i really need help
channel.description:
i know basic java im not very advanced but i know the basic stuff so it wont be hard to help me. ;D all i want to know is how i can put objects in other spots? such as dummys, hay, and doors to train on? bank booths things like that...
i also want to know how to change the teleport coordinates on the buttons in the emote list...? ive always wondered how to do that.
how do i make a safe spot on a pk server
and lastly how do i change where u log in at?such as on pimpscape when u log in for the first time they start u in varrock. how do i change that place? please help i would greatly appreciate it if someone told me how to do this...[br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2007, 08:21:35 PM[/size][hr]someone plz help... come on[br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2007, 08:31:52 PM[/size][hr]using pimpscape [br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2007, 08:35:35 PM[/size][hr]omg someone please help[br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2007, 09:33:06 PM[/size][hr]omg someone plz help

item.title: Can someone show me how to do this please? i really need help
item.dc:creator: @bloop bloop
item.description:
@bloop wrote:

Ok to change places were objeckts stands: go into objec. FInd dummy and change the , x and y coordinates.
makeGlobalObject(change x, change y, 823, 0, 10);//dummy IF you dont find . search for : "public void new" And you will many new objeckts downwards. ex: makeGlobalObjeckt(3333,2222,823,0,10);//dummy … and bank and all other objeckts.

To change teleport palce on emote list.
Go into your server. Press the emote button you want to change. Then look at your runserver.bat or whatever you runned.
Then you will see a number. Like: player (zezima) did action: 5556 … The writings are not like that. But you will see your player and what action it does…
Go into client.java and search for the number . You will see some x and y coords. change them.

To change place when you log in. Go into player.java and search for the coordinates that is when you make a new account and start in ex varrock bank. search for the coordinates from there and edit in player.java to what you want.

Done

Bloop

Read full topic
